title.narrative: Voluntary medical campaign to combat blindness and its diseases.

description.narrative: 1. Providing medical services to low-income beneficiaries who cannot cover the costs of their treatment 2. Performing surgeries 3. Providing patients with drugs, eyeglasses and lenses 5. Eliminate the suffering of many people who are blind 6. Health education for everyone receiving treatment 7. Aid to the Ministry of Health, which suffers from a lack of ophthalmologists

Voluntary medical campaign to combat blindness and its diseases: Diagnosing 5,000 medical conditions, performing surgeries according to need and after the initial screening (450 to 550 max), and dispensing 1000 eyeglasses as needed.
